title: MITRE Caldera for OT Now Available as Extension
description:
MITRE Caldera for OT is now publicly available as an extension to the open-source Caldera platform. Learn more here.

The post MITRE Caldera for OT Now Available as Extension appeared first on Linux Today.

title: CutefishOS ‘Reborn’ Arrives With Debian 12 and Ubuntu 22.04
description:
Discover the new CutefishOS Reborn Beta, blending Debian 12 and Ubuntu 22.04, offering you an exciting, modern experience.

The post CutefishOS ‘Reborn’ Arrives With Debian 12 and Ubuntu 22.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
